summary: Ernest P. Worrell becomes a basketball star after an angel bearing an uncanny resemblance to Kareem Abdul-Jabbar gives him a pair of magic sneakers.
cast: Jim Varney|Cylk Cozart|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Colin Lawrence|Miguel A. Núñez Jr.|Lester Barrie|Richard Leacock|Jay Brazeau|Stevie Vallance|Aaron Joseph|Douglas Newell|Henry O. Watson|Lossen Chambers|Charles Andrew Payne|Brenda Crichlow|A.J. Bond|Stuart Davidson|Chris Turner|Myles Ferguson|Nathaniel DeVeaux|David Jacox|Babe Dolan|Jim Dunn|Vanessa Paris|William Lawrence|George Josef|Brent Woolsey|Gerry Nairn|Charles Andre|Brian Arnold|Greg Rogers|Rick Pearce|Quinton Gipson
director: Director: John R. Cherry III (as John Cherry)
title: Slam Dunk Ernest
